div.p: A relationship between two entities that is formally recognized, frequently by a contract or similar agreement.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleClass where concept is-a _RoleClassRelationshipFormal

Exclude these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleClass
CodeDisplay
_RoleClassRelationshipFormalRoleClassRelationshipFormalA relationship between two entities that is formally recognized, frequently by a contract or similar agreement.

description.value: A relationship between two entities that is formally recognized, frequently by a contract or similar agreement.
